mapper.select: SELECT b_no,b_subject,name,b_regdate,b_hit,num FROM ( SELECT b_no,b_subject,name,b_regdate,b_hit,rownum as num FROM ( SELECT b_no,b_subject,name,b_regdate,b_hit FROM board, member WHERE b_cate_no=#{b_cate_no} AND board.member_no=member.member_no ORDER BY b_no DESC )) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(b_no)+1,1) FROM board), #{b_cate_no}, #{member_no}, #{b_subject}, #{b_content}, SYSDATE,0 )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE b_subject LIKE ('%'||#{q}||'%')
SELECT * FROM board,member WHERE b_subject LIKE ('%'||#{q}||'%') AND b_cate_no=#{b_cate_no} AND board.member_no=member.member_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community_reply_board(r_no,b_no,name,r_content,r_regdate) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(r_no)+1,1) FROM community_reply_board), #{b_no}, #{name}, #{r_content}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT r_no,b_no,name,r_content,TO_CHAR(r_regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as dbday FROM community_reply_board WHERE b_no=#{b_no} ORDER BY r_no DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM community_reply_board WHERE r_no=#{r_no} AND b_no=#{b_no}
